title: Teemo
body: There sould be a Captain Teemo Skin. Because he always says: Captain Teemo On Duty

replies.body: They should just nerf him to oblivion

It would probably cross some religious barriers but I would rather see a Satan skin for him:  Dye him red, add a couple of horns and a trident, and he could spawn little Hellish looking mushrooms or whatever.  Would go hand in hand with his kit.
